text: Adventure in Odessa () is a 1953 Soviet comedy-drama movie directed by Vasily Zhuravlyov.Неразлучные друзьяНеразлучные друзья (1952) It stars Mikhail Kuznetsov, Evgeniy Samoylov, and Viktor Dobrovolsky. ==Actors== * Mikhail Kuznetsov as Professor Belov * Evgeniy Samoylov as Gleb's Father * Viktor Dobrovolsky as School Director * Aleksandr Antonov as Chairman of the Collective Farm * Ivan Pelttser as Old Fisherman == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1953 comedy-drama movies Category:Soviet comedy movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Vasily Zhuravlyov
